Here are a few things I would like to have: - Portability (1.7kg or less) - Battery life (5-6 hours on average) - Heating issues (able to work with a laptop on couch or lap) I feel like these two below are the most  ones with .
The press depth is decent and overall the typing feels reassuring and comfortable.
I tried a lot of Fan Control tools and the "[Asus Fan Control V5]( allows to set the fan to a constant 2000rpm.

The only point that was initially a minus was the fan, which even in balanced energy and silent fan mode has a tendency to spin up and down when the CPU got anything to do, and the sharp spin up is very audible.
